code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import NoteContext from'../context/notes/noteContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NoteItems(props){const{note,updateNote}=props;const context=useContext(NoteContext);const{deleteNote}=context;const handleDelete=()=>{deleteNote(note._id);props.showAlert("Note is deleted successfully","success");};let date=note.date;date=date.slice(0,-14).split('-').reverse().join('-');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4 my-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:[note.title," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-trash-can mx-2",onClick:handleDelete}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-regular fa-pen-to-square mx-2",onClick:()=>{updateNote(note);}})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:note.tag})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:note.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-secondary small text-end ",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("small",{children:[date," "]})})]})})});}export default NoteItems;
